Here is a link to the BBC biography and here is the Downing St release: The Prime Minister has appointed Craig Oliver, currently Controller of BBC Global News, as the Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. The Prime Minister said: "I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the Government's programme. Craig Oliver said: "I'm delighted to be joining David Cameron and his team at such an exciting and challenging time. "It's difficult to leave the BBC after a fascinating few years
